pr_title: Add Remote Config Pubish, Validate, and GetTemplateAtVersion operations

timeline.message: Add Pubish, Validate, and GetTemplateAtVersion operations
Add Pubish, Validate, and GetTemplateAtVersion operations
Add Pubish, Validate, and GetTemplateAtVersion operations

timeline.bodyText:
Provide a few overloads so that callers don't have to specify the boolean flags all the time.
publishTemplateOp(Template template)
publishTemplateOp(Template template, boolean validateOnly)
publishTemplateOp(Template template, boolean validateOnly, boolean forcePublish)
timeline.author: hiranya911

replies.bodyText: Or use an internal PublishSettings type to encapsulate the boolean flags.
replies.author: hiranya911

replies.bodyText: Added a new internal type PublishSettings. Thanks!
replies.author: lahirumaramba

timeline.author: hiranya911

timeline.bodyText: Which line is supposed to throw in this test case?
timeline.author: hiranya911

replies.bodyText: Good catch! It should throw on client.getTemplateAtVersion("24");. Converted into to two separate tests.
replies.author: lahirumaramba

timeline.bodyText: Here too. Which lines are supposed to throw? The test case will terminate upon encountering the first exception.
timeline.author: hiranya911

replies.bodyText: Ah good catch! It should throw on client.publishTemplate(new Template(), false, false);. Separated into two tests.
replies.author: lahirumaramba

timeline.bodyText: This can probably live in the parent package as a package-protected class.
timeline.author: hiranya911

replies.bodyText: Good call! Moved to the parent class and made package protected, including the ctor. Thanks!
replies.author: lahirumaramba
